ataweni amarikan hamudawe nawa anadena niladhariya lesa pathwi ena janaral rijwe yatathe nawatha prathisanwidhanaya wenna owun katayuthu karanawa. 1951 pebarawari masaya weddi batahirin suwon nagarayedith, madhyayen wonju nagarayedith nagenahirin samchiyok nagarayedith china praharaya nawathwanna amarikawa samath wenawa. 38 weni deshanshayata madak dakunen satan sima sthawara wenawa.

lekhakaya thama niwasin bahara wu wigasama asalwasi gruhaniyak ayage niwasata yamata padipela nagimin sitiyaya.thattu niwasa wala wesennan mitar kihipayak epita thama jiwana charyawala yedunath owunowun ha etharam handunumkamk athikaraganimata kamaththak nodakwana bawin dedena athara kisima kathabahak nowuni.namuth lekhakaya aya thamagen sirith paridi udasana rondaya sandaha yanawada kiya asana ayuru sithe mawagaththeya.emenma ohu wisin eyata pilithuru lesa thamanta etharam gunayak nodanena bawin dostharagen behethak illa ganimata yana bawa kiyanayuruda ohu sithagaththeya.me pilithure athi wyangarthaya nisa ohu nawathath thamatama sinasuneya.rassawak nokarana,wiwahayak ho daruwan nathiwa janakirna nagaraye thattu niwasaye sitina,thaniyama sinasena pissek kiya ema gruhaniya thaman gana sithagena sitinawata sakayak natha.aya gana ohuta 'pawu' kiya sithuni.

lankawata laba dimata niyamitha amerikanu dolar miliyana 407.8 ka thunwani ha siwu wani naya warikaya kadinamin laba dimata jathyanthara mulya aramudala thiranaya karayi.shri lankawa ta laba dena naya warikaya sambandhayen samalochanaya kirimata pereda (28) ras wu jathyanthara mulya aramudale widhayaka kamituwa adala naya mudala kadinamin shri lankawa ta laba dimata thiranaya kara athi athara melesa shri lankawata laba dimata niyamitha samastha naya mudala amerikanu dolar biliyana 2.6 ki.mema naya mudale mul warikaya wu amerikanu dolar miliyana 322 ka mudala pasugiya wasare juli masaye di shri lankawa ta laba dun athara ehi dewani warikaya wu amerikanu dolar miliyana 330 ka mudala ema wasare nowambar masaye di pradanaya kerini.in anathuruwa thewani naya warikaya shri lankawata laba dimata pera shri lankawe aarthika wardhanaya, uddhamanaya, sewa wyukthiya aadi agayan pilibanda adhikshanaya kirimata me wasare mayi masaye 12 da sita 21 da thek jathyanthara mulya aramudale niyojitha kandayamak shri lankawata paminiye ya.
